title: I think miscellaneous should be titled something else
body:
Like "General" or something. Because in my opinion most people are going to post  on this "board" since it seems like the new "general discussion"

Hi, thankyou for reading this post friends.

replies.body: {{champion:1}} one else think they should have just named this GD in the first place.
I think they should make a board called "GD" like NA has.
Hi friend, yes i think that is a great idea friend.
